item.title: 周四，西伯利亚一家法院驳回了美国和俄罗斯双重国籍公民克谢尼娅-卡列琳娜（Ksenia Karelina）的上诉。
item.description:
A court in Siberia denied on Thursday the appeal of Ksenia Karelina, a dual American-Russian citizen, who appeared via video link to appeal her detention on charges of treason. https://t.co/YUj2K6wYCs

item.title: 前总统特朗普将移民问题作为竞选的核心信息，几乎每次露面都在谈论这个问题，同时吹嘘他在第二个任期内将采取的措施：
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump has made immigration a central campaign message and spent nearly every appearance on the trail talking about it while touting what he would do about it in a second term.

item.title: 一项新的研究显示，在长达数年的海洋热浪的破坏性影响下，北太平洋约有 7,000 头座头鲸在 2012 年至 2021 年期间死亡。
item.description:
Approximately 7,000 humpback whales in the North Pacific Ocean died between 2012 and 2021 after the damaging effects of a yearslong marine heatwave, according to a new study. https://t.co/x6EwfdBe5X pic.twitter.com/hlzdqfsoEK

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 消息人士透露，被指控泄露机密军事文件并将其发布到网上的马萨诸塞州空军国民警卫队队员杰克-特谢拉（Jack Teixeira）已与联邦检察官达成认罪协议。
item.description:
BREAKING: Jack Teixeira, the Massachusetts Air National Guardsman accused of leaking classified military documents and posting them online, has reached an agreement with federal prosecutors to plead guilty, sources say. https://t.co/EfaHzqES3n pic.twitter.com/ktIkohLonp

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在边境给前总统特朗普的致辞："与其告诉国会议员阻止这项立法，不如和我一起--或者我和你一起--告诉国会通过这项两党边境安全法案。我们可以一起做到这一点"。
item.description:
Pres. Biden’s message to former Pres. Trump from the border: “Instead of telling members of Congress to block this legislation, join me — or I’ll join you — in telling the Congress to pass this bipartisan border security bill. We can do it together.” https://t.co/wD9UMC4uil pic.twitter.com/mbN67YWu7l

— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) February 29, 2024

item.title: 费城地方检察官办公室宣布，一名因 1994 年纵火谋杀一名妇女而被定罪并判处死刑的费城男子在 30 年后被免于起诉。
item.description:
A Philadelphia man who was convicted and sentenced to death in connection with the 1994 arson murder of a woman is now exonerated 30 years later, the city's District Attorney's Office announced. https://t.co/bnB9TGN6SO

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 成功起诉唐纳德-特朗普诽谤的专栏作家 E. Jean Carroll 的律师反对前总统试图暂停执行陪审团命令他支付的 8,330 万美元判决。

item.title: 国防部长劳埃德-奥斯汀（Lloyd Austin）在作证时说，他对自己在接受手术以及后来因并发症住进重症监护室时瞒着白宫负有 "全部责任"。

item.title: 召回警报：克莱斯勒召回超过 33 万辆吉普大切诺基，原因是方向盘问题可能导致驾驶员失去对车辆的控制。

item.title: 德克萨斯州居民在地面上和无人机在空中拍摄到的画面显示了致命的烟屋溪大火所造成的破坏规模，这场大火是该州历史上最大的野火。
item.description:
Footage captured by Texas residents on the ground and by a drone in the air shows the scale of destruction left by the deadly Smokehouse Creek Fire, now the largest wildfire in state history. https://t.co/696aFULoQo pic.twitter.com/gaD0EcipZH

item.title: 凯莉-瑞帕（Kelly Ripa）和马克-康苏埃洛斯（Mark Consuelos）正在进行一次回忆之旅。这对夫妇参观了拉斯维加斯的钟楼教堂，他们早在 1996 年就在那里私奔了，而且没有错过重现婚礼当天照片的机会。
item.description:
Kelly Ripa and Mark Consuelos are taking a trip down memory lane.

The couple visited Chapel of the Bells in Las Vegas where they eloped back in 1996 — and didn't miss out on the opportunity to recreate a photo from their wedding day. https://t.co/9ZhGd2LTwM

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国平均长期抵押贷款利率连续第四周上升，在春季购房旺季来临之际，这对有意购房者来说又是一次挫折。
item.description:

item.title: 最新消息：阿拉巴马州最高法院关于胚胎是儿童的裁决引起了人们对该州试管婴儿治疗的质疑，在此之后，阿拉巴马州众议院通过了恢复试管婴儿治疗的立法。
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: 最新消息：众议院投票通过了一项短期拨款法案，以避免政府在周五截止日期前部分关门。该法案现将提交参议院。
